name: 4 Fun in 1
overview:
4 Fun In One System was produced by Armenia in 1981. This multi-game system lets you select from four different bootlegs that resemble Centipede, Defender, Galaxian, and Pac-Man.

They are:

1. Galactic Convey (an arcade game like Centipede with Galaxian mixied)
2. Scramble Part 2
3. Galaxian Part 5 (more like an updated/tweeked version of the original Galaxian than a sequel)
4. The Ghost Muncher Part 3 (more like a clone version of Pac-Man and an update to Ghost Muncher)
